span.p: As of March 30th, Governor Doug Ducey and Superintendent of Public Instruction, Kathy Hoffman, announced the closure of all Arizona schools through the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year. This announcement came as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

BFCS is committed to providing ongoing guidance and resources as we sort through this unprecedented situation together. We will always strive to do what is best for our students, families, teachers, and staff. Please continue to monitor your email and other communication channels for additional information - we will keep the letters, resources, and other information on our COVID-19 Updates page for easy reference.
- The Benjamin Franklin Charter School Team
